sentence.Network_en: Laura glanced at Grace, expecting a cheeky riposte.
sentence.Network_cn: 劳拉匆匆瞥了格雷斯一眼，想着他会厚着脸皮巧妙地反驳一下。

sentence.Network_en: The US delivered an early riposte to the air attack.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国对空袭很快作出了反应。

sentence.Network_en: The operation is being seen as a swift riposte to the killing of a senior army commander.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次军事行动被看作是对一名高级军事指挥官被杀所作出的迅速还击。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French risposte (noun), risposter (verb), from Italian risposta 'response'

entry.def: A riposte is a quick, clever reply to something that someone has said.

example.ex: Laura glanced at Grace, expecting a cheeky riposte.
example.tran: 劳拉匆匆瞥了格雷斯一眼，想着他会厚着脸皮巧妙地反驳一下。

entry.def: If you riposte, you make a quick, clever response to something someone has said.

example.ex: 'It's tough at the top,' he said. 'It's tougher at the bottom,' riposted the billionaire.
example.tran: “身居高位很辛苦，”他说。“在底层更辛苦，”这个亿万富翁机敏地回答道。

entry.def: You can refer to an action as a riposte to something when it is a response to that thing.

example.ex: The operation is being seen as a swift riposte to the killing of a senior army commander.
example.tran: 这次军事行动被看作是对一名高级军事指挥官被杀所作出的迅速还击。

means.word_mean: 1. a quick reply to a question or remark (especially a witty or critical one);

sentences.sentence: "it brought a sharp rejoinder from the teacher"

auth_sentence.content: She loved it if she found another guest equally good at the quick riposte.
auth_sentence.res_content: She loved it if she found another guest equally good at the quick riposte.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She loved it if she found another guest equally good at the quick riposte.

auth_sentence.content: "You're not singing anymore" was Cardiff supporters' riposte as their Liverpool counterparts were stunned into silence.
auth_sentence.res_content: "You're not singing anymore" was Cardiff supporters' riposte as their Liverpool counterparts were stunned into silence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "You're not singing anymore" was Cardiff supporters' riposte as their Liverpool counterparts were stunned into silence.

auth_sentence.content: It was, on the day, an effective riposte - even if it sidestepped the main issue.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was, on the day, an effective riposte - even if it sidestepped the main issue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was, on the day, an effective riposte - even if it sidestepped the main issue.
